name: Smashy BigFoot Gorilla
description:
The war of Giant Monster Gorilla for revenge is just begin!

Smashy BigFoot Gorilla is all about putting your massive arms to use and cause chaos! Utilize your stealth and cleverness to carefully calculate the right time to STRIKE and CRUSH your foes with force!

This time incredible gorilla has decided to take a final revenge in this city battle. Now monster roamed into the city and attacking with no fear. Gorilla has ultimate super powers, strength & agility. Use super powers to create destruction in city!

Destroy everything that comes in your way, Smash the chopers, and Crush the army & Punch down the buildings!
Play in Career and Survival mode and have fun. Select your monster from variety to choose from. Open the Pandora of fight, action, thrill & adventure to have a blasting experience of rampage.

Let’s jump in this amazing fighting world and get ready to show your fighting skills! Go with the flow & put your inner monster out of the box! Different action packed missions with ultimate thrill & adventure are waiting for you! Sometimes what all you need is to be a monster!

Prove with your might that you’re the ultimate villain of this City!

Smashy BigFoot Gorilla Features:
• Variety of monsters to choose from & find out their
• Addictive game play
• Smooth & intuitive controls
• Different action packed missions with loads of thrill
• 3D graphics with City street Environment
• Engaging background music with sound effects
• Fun & Easy to play
• Realistic city smashing effects.
